title: (1) (B) For plots with area exceeding 2 Hectare and above, 5% Amenity Space shall also be provided and for development of such Amenity Space, the provisions in 14
clause_text: (1) (B) For plots with area exceeding 2 Hectare and above, 5% Amenity Space shall also be provided and for development of such Amenity Space, the provisions in 14.6.21 of the said Regulations shall apply.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
